metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2760 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
mod_auth_openid before 0.7 for Apache uses world-readable permissions for /tmp/mod_auth_openid.db, which allows local users to obtain session ids.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2760` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-openid - 0.7-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openid package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7-0.1').
